mapper.select: SELECT member_id as memberId, member_name as memberName, member_phone as memberPhone, member_addr as memberAddr, member_email as memberEmail FROM member WHERE member_id= #{memberId}
SELECT member_id as memberId FROM member WHERE member_email= #{memberEmail}
SELECT member_id as memberId FROM member WHERE member_id= #{memberIdCheck}
SELECT member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw FROM member WHERE member_id= #{memberId} AND member_pw=#{memberPw}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(member_id , member_pw, member_name, member_phone, member_addr, member_email) VALUE ( #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberAddr}, #{memberEmail} );
